title: Kellie Pickler is a showstopper in a cobalt dress at the American Valor event in Washington D.C.
text:
With her outgoing personality, it's only fitting that she choose a dress that would have all eyes on her.

And Kellie Pickler commanded attention in a bright blue cobalt dress at the 2019 American Valor: A Salute to Our Heroes Veterans Day special in Washington D.C. on Saturday.

The evening was the closing ceremony of an annual conference, put together by the American Veterans Centers.

Pretty: On Saturday, Kellie Pickler, 33, commanded attention in a bright blue cobalt dress at the 2019 American Valor: A Salute to Our Heroes Veterans Day special in Washington D.C

The bubbly blonde wore her long hair down and in vintage waves.

Kellie highlighted her light colored eyes with dark liner, and in lieu of a traditional red lip, chose a natural shade instead.

The 33-year-old accessorized with a stud earrings, a ring and a pendant necklace.

Appropriate: The bubbly blonde wore her long hair down and in vintage waves

Minimal: Kellie highlighted her colored eyes with dark liner, and in lieu of a traditional red lip, chose a natural shade instead

Since 2011, Kellie has been married to husband Kylie Jacobs.

The Pickler And Ben co-host became engaged to her songwriter husband in June 2010, when he proposed to her on a beach.

They married in the Caribbean in January of the following year.

How sweet: While on the carpet, Kellie received a hug from a veteran

In her element: The Wedding at Graceland star gave a performance during the evening

Kellie rose to fame as a contestant on American Idol in 2005.

She later signed a record deal in 2006, and has since released four albums, and won numerous awards.

The North Carolina native and her husband starred in their reality show, I Love Kelly Pickler. She has since appeared in multiple Hallmark films, and can next be seen in Wedding at Graceland and The Mistletoe Secret.

Beaming: Laura Prepon, 39, cradled her baby bump while on the red carpet
description: On Saturday, Kellie Pickler , 33,commanded attention in a bright blue cobalt dress at the 2019 American Valor: A Salute to Our Heroes Veterans Day special in Washington D.C.
